action.text: SA 5101 fell when cloture on the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 2938 with an amendment SA 5099 was invoked.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 5101 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S3028; text: CR S3028) To add an effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5101 proposed by Senator Schumer.
